## `rJOTA`: Functions and visual aesthetic themes for 'ggplot2' used in <https://jota.info> 

### Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("JOTAJornalismo/rJOTA")
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE, include=FALSE}
options(width=120)
```


### Usage

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, error=FALSE}
library(rJOTA)
library(tidyverse)
# current verison
packageVersion("rJOTA")





```
